item.title: Testing R Markdown
item.description: Describe what weâ€™re going to try and do library(ffscrapr) Do something here with the league connection league <- sleeper_connect(season = 2021, league_id = 649923060580864000) rosters <- ff_rosters(league) print(rosters) ## # A tibble: 375 x 7 ## franchise_id franchise_name player_id player_name pos team age ## <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <dbl> ## 1 1 ChristyCampbell 6068 Devine Ozigbo RB JAX 24.4 ## 2 1 ChristyCampbell 1848 James White RB NE 29.
